testcase.classname: Life Insurance quotation on comparethemarket website
testcase.name: Completing Life Insurance quotation form
testcase.system-out: Given user is on www.comparethemarket.com/life-insurance/...................passed When user clicks on Get a quote.............................................passed And user clicks on Just myself for single quote.............................passed And user selects relevant title.............................................passed And user provides first name................................................passed And user provides surname...................................................passed And user selects the date of birth..........................................passed And user selects relevant smoking option....................................passed And user selects relevant cover type........................................passed And user provides duration of cover.........................................passed And user provides the amount of required cover..............................passed And user clicks on critical illness cover...................................passed And user clicks on Additional critical illness cover........................passed And user provides the amount of additional critical illness cover...........passed And user provides email address.............................................passed And user provides phone number..............................................passed And user provides house number..............................................passed And user provides postcode..................................................passed And user clicks on Find address.............................................passed And user selects on preferred contact.......................................passed And user clicks on confirm..................................................passed And user clicks on Get your quotes..........................................passed And user should be able to see all quotations...............................passed And user clicks on remove critical illness cover............................passed And user clicks on update result............................................passed Then user should be able to see updated quotation...........................passed
